DataSourcePortable.Name: Aprovação AP Contratos
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN C.NUMERO IS NULL THEN CAST(D.NUMERO AS VARCHAR(50)) ELSE C.NUMERO END) NUMEROCONTRATOOC,
 C.DATAINICIO,
 C.DATAFIM
 FROM CP_RECEBIMENTOFISICO A
 INNER JOIN FN_DOCUMENTOS B ON (B.RECEBIMENTOFISICO = A.RECEBIMENTOFISICOPAI)
 LEFT JOIN CN_CONTRATOS C ON (C.HANDLE = A.CONTRATO)
 LEFT JOIN CP_ORDENSCOMPRA D ON (D.HANDLE = A.ORDEMCOMPRA)
 WHERE B.HANDLE = COALESCE(CAST('@~SESSAO(APROVACAO.AP.CONTRATOS.HANDLE)' AS INTEGER), 0)
 ORDER BY 1 " /> <Fields> <Field Alias="NUMEROCONTRATOOC" From="A" Path="NUMEROCONTRATOOC" /> <DateField Alias="DATAINICIO" From="A" Path="DATAINICIO" FieldDateFormat="DayMonthYear" FieldTimeFormat="HourMinuteSecond" /> <DateField Alias="DATAFIM" From="A" Path="DATAFIM" FieldDateFormat="DayMonthYear" FieldTimeFormat="HourMinuteSecond" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
